name: Crusher
description:
20 levels of boxes. Crush them and learn their secrets.

Controls: Use WASD to move, press R to restart the current level, press Z to go back one turn.

Alternatively, you can play the game at: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=a1a2a6447027da2bddb50de802a0e236
